entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 8.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
